library(learnr)

## Parsons problem

Try this programming problem:

```{r iris, echo=FALSE}
question_parsons(
  "Try this problem",
  answer(c(
    "iris",
    "mutate(...)",
    "summarize(...)",
    "print()"
  ),
  correct = TRUE)
)
```
